intro.body: Alfa Beauty Cosmetica is committed to protecting our partners and welcomes vulnerability reports from security researchers.

disclosure.title: Vulnerability Disclosure
disclosure.body: If you believe you have discovered a vulnerability, please report it to us via email at:

guidelines.title: Reporting Guidelines
items: Provide a detailed description of the vulnerability.
Include steps to reproduce the issue (PoC).
Do not access or modify data that does not belong to you.

safeHarbor.title: Safe Harbor
safeHarbor.body: We will not pursue legal action against researchers who report vulnerabilities in good faith and in accordance with this policy.

response.title: Response Timeline
response.body: We aim to acknowledge receipt of your report within 24 hours and evaluate severity within 5 business days.

intro.body: PT. Alfa Beauty Cosmetica ('we', 'our') is committed to protecting your personal data in compliance with the Personal Data Protection Law (UU No. 27 of 2022). This policy explains how we process your information.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Data Collection
items: Identity Data: Business name, contact person, city, and salon & barber type.
Contact Data: WhatsApp number and email address.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, and interaction metrics (via Vercel and Sentry).

howWeUse.title: 2. Purpose of Processing
items: To process partnership applications and verify business legitimacy.
To facilitate B2B consultation and product ordering via WhatsApp.
To comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax reporting).
To improve platform security and performance.

storageSecurity.title: 3. Storage & Retention
storageSecurity.body: Your data is stored securely in Supabase (AWS) infrastructure. We retain partnership data as long as the business relationship exists or as required by Indonesian law (minimum 5 years for financial records).

cookies.title: 4. Cookies & Analytics
cookies.body: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics to understand usage patterns. You may disable cookies in your browser settings.

contact.title: 5. User Rights (UU PDP)
contact.body: Under UU PDP, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at: alfabeautycosmeticaa@gmail.com.

intro.body: By accessing this website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please discontinue use immediately.

websiteUse.title: 1. B2B Platform
websiteUse.body: This platform is intended solely for professional salon & barber businesses and beauty distributors in Indonesia. It is not for general consumer retail.

noPublicPricing.title: 2. Pricing & Ordering
noPublicPricing.body: We do not publish public price lists to protect our B2B partners. Final pricing is confirmed only via official WhatsApp invoices or Facture.

limitations.title: 3. Disclaimer of Warranties
limitations.body: The content is provided 'as is'. While we strive for accuracy, we do not warrant that product descriptions or educational content are error-free.

changes.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
changes.body: PT. Alfa Beauty Cosmetica shall not be liable for any indirect damages arising from the use of this website. Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by Indonesian law.
